title: 【1.7.3】锦鲤Koi Mob Beta 1.2a
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
Put them in a tank!

Or a pond!



确认兼容Confirmed compatible with: 

TooManyItems, Zombe's Mods, Millenare, Humans+, Mo'Creatures (read below), More Creeps and Weirdos, Baby Animals, Better Stained Glass, Nandonalt's... everything, 
Singleplayer Commands, Wild Grass, a lot of others I CBA to list



不相容Incompatible with:

WhiteGold (WhiteGold overwrites the koi eggs and flakes, I don't THINK this is my incompatibility, as everything in the koi mod is supposed to look for open IDs to use)



在这里下载：
